title: Political Figure Allegedly Involved in Kidnapping Case in Ludhiana
author: Unknown
summary: Police are investigating claims of a kidnapping in Ludhiana, where a local political figure is allegedly involved. The incident occurred after the suspect reportedly retaliated against a boy who had filed a complaint against him by kidnapping the complainant's sister.
content:
Law enforcement authorities in Ludhiana are facing scrutiny over their handling of a reported kidnapping case involving a local political figure. According to sources, the suspect allegedly kidnapped a young girl in what appears to be an act of retaliation against her brother, who had previously filed a complaint against the suspect.

Despite the serious nature of the allegations, witnesses claim that no substantial police action has been taken thus far. The identity of the victim and her brother are being withheld for safety concerns.

source.title: A political scumbag kidnapped a girl in Ludhiana and is bragging about it. (Verified). Police hasn't taken any action
source.content: Tdlr - A boy made a complaint against this scumbag, so this scumbag kidnaped his sister
